name: Interface & Control Systems
overview: Interface & Control Systems, Inc., a product development and engineering services company, provides real-time, embedded, and autonomous command and control software systems. It offers Remote Intelligent Monitoring System for remotely monitoring satellite data feeds and archiving content to provide historical trend data and performance analysis services; sensorMiner, a data mining toolset that uses past performance data to build a model to provide real-time fault detection capability; and SpaceCraft MarkUp Language, an extension of the Extensible Markup Language. The company also provides Fault Modeling Tools that offer a methodology for fault detection isolation and recovery, and anomaly detection and resolution; embedded systems for satellite controllers, payloads, intelligence systems, and industrial control systems; and automation software for satellites, control centers, ground stations, testsets, simulators, and e-business systems. Interface & Control Systems, Inc. offers its products for application in the aerospace, intelligence, and e-commerce sectors. The company was incorporated in 1988 and is based in Indialantic, Florida with an additional office in and Columbia, Maryland. As of July 1, 2008, Interface & Control Systems, Inc. operates as a subsidiary of SRA International Inc.
